mapper.update: update ACCOUNTS set LAST_LOGIN_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
mapper.select: select account_id, password, is_admin, is_active, first_login, last_login_time, create_time, update_time from ACCOUNTS where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}

SELECT -- 账号表字段 a.account_id AS accountId, a.is_admin AS isAdmin, a.first_login AS firstLogin, a.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, -- 员工表字段 e.emp_id AS empId, e.emp_name AS empName, e.position AS position, e.phone AS phone, e.email AS email, e.is_manager AS isManager, e.dept_id AS deptId, -- 部门表字段 d.dept_name AS deptName FROM accounts a -- 关联员工表（账号ID=员工ID，一对一强制关联） INNER JOIN employees e ON a.account_id = e.emp_id -- 关联部门表（员工所属部门，强制关联） INNER JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id -- 查询条件：账号ID WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT account_id AS accountId, is_admin AS isAdmin, -- 管理员默认不是经理（根据业务可调整） FALSE AS isManager, first_login AS firstLogin, last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, -- 管理员无部门和职位，返回null（可不写，默认就是null） NULL AS deptName, NULL AS position, -- 管理员无员工ID和姓名，返回null NULL AS empId, NULL AS empName FROM accounts WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND is_admin = TRUE -- 确保只查询管理员账号 AND is_active = TRUE -- 只查询启用状态的账号
